apiKey.description: API key corresponding to the admin API login.

ipWhiteList.description: List of IP addresses from which API calls using API accounts are permitted. You can specify a range, an individual IP address, or an IP in CIDR notation. Example: ["1.1.1.1-1.1.1.8", "1.2.3.4", "1.5.5.0/24"] The default is ["0.0.0.0/0"] which permits API calls from all IP addresses. For security, we strongly recommend specifying appropriate IP addresses for your company.
